content:
Is there any way to add to webhook additional URL parameters, for example descr2, descr3 for specify more labels from alertmanager?
https://zulip.com/integrations/doc/alertmanager
p.s. The existing webhook integration gets data only via "descr". Unluckly, the parameter "name" doesn't work.
@Igor Sekan can you talk a bit more about what actual output you're hoping to see?

It would be great to get more additional fields from alertmanager. For example : alertname, servicename, instance, etc
image.png

@Igor Sekan if you want to draft a sample Zulip messages you'd like to see with additional fields (that feels useful and not cluttered), probably someone in the community can work towards implementing an improvement.
